p: By RT-PCR, 69/91 (75.8%) of the cases were confirmed as monoinfections or coinfections by CHIKV and/or DENV and/or ZIKV. From those, 40/69 (58.0%) were characterized as CHIKV monoinfections, 9/69 (13.0%) as ZIKV monoinfections, 16/69 (23.2%) as CHIKV and ZIKV coinfections, 3/69 (4.3%) as CHIKV/DENV-4 coinfection, and one (1/69, 1.4%) as a ZIKV/DENV-4 coinfection.
